services.title: Public Relations
services.description: Excellent writing skills; all types of press releases (technical, corporate social investment, etc.)

services.title: Social media
services.description: Creation of social media content including design of online banners, etc. Posting, sharing, liking and reposting.

services.title: Advertising
services.description: Creation of targeted advertising schedules, end-to-end coordination from ad bookings to final material.

services.title: Graphic Design
services.description: Digital advertisements, online banners, e-newsletters, flyers, posters, brochures, street posters, bill boards.

services.title: Coordination
services.description: Coordination of events, press conferences, exhibitions, etc.
